modName: Merchants add their earnings to the strongbox
summary: Now, at the end of the day, merchants add their loot back to their strongboxes.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][color=#000000][size=5][b][u]Strongboxes Regen[/u][/b][/size][/color][/font][/center] [center]This mod makes it so that the contents of a merchant's strongbox regenerates and then re-locks after 24 in-game hours.

Change Log:

Version 2:
Strongboxes now lock again.[/center]
author: Specter0987
